trans-unit.source: Encapsulates the data source for a form.
trans-unit.target: 封裝表單的資料來源。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> component serves many purposes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>元件有許多用途。

trans-unit.source: First, it simplifies binding controls on a form to data by providing currency management, change notification, and other services between Windows Forms controls and data sources.
trans-unit.target: 首先，它可簡化將控制項繫結至資料的表單上提供貨幣管理、 變更通知和 Windows Form 控制項和資料來源之間的其他服務。

trans-unit.source: This is accomplished by attaching the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> component to your data source using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataSource%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 這可以藉由附加<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>元件至您的資料來源使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataSource%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: For complex binding scenarios you can optionally set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataMember%2A> property to a specific column or list in the data source.
trans-unit.target: 複雜繫結的情況下您可以選擇性地設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataMember%2A>特定資料行或資料來源資訊清單中的屬性。

trans-unit.source: You then bind controls to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>.
trans-unit.target: 您接著將控制項繫結至<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>。

trans-unit.source: All further interaction with the data is accomplished with calls to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> component.
trans-unit.target: 與資料的所有進一步互動由呼叫來完成<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>元件。

trans-unit.source: For examples on how the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> can simplify the binding process, see [How to: Bind Windows Forms Controls to DBNull Database Values](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-bind-windows-forms-controls-to-dbnull-database-values.md) and [How to: Handle Errors and Exceptions that Occur with Databinding](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-handle-errors-and-exceptions-that-occur-with-databinding.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需如何的範例<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>可以簡化繫結程序，請參閱[How to: Windows Form 控制項繫結至 DBNull 資料庫值](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-bind-windows-forms-controls-to-dbnull-database-values.md)和[如何： 處理錯誤和使用資料繫結所發生的例外狀況](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-handle-errors-and-exceptions-that-occur-with-databinding.md).

trans-unit.source: Navigation and updating of the data source is accomplished through methods such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.MoveNext%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.MoveLast%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Remove%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 瀏覽和更新的資料來源透過完成方法例如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.MoveNext%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.MoveLast%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Remove%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Operations such as sorting and filtering are handled through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Sort%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Filter%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 排序和篩選等作業都是透過處理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Sort%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Filter%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: For more information on using sorting and filtering with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>, see [How to: Sort and Filter ADO.NET Data with the Windows Forms BindingSource Component](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sort-and-filter-ado-net-data-with-wf-bindingsource-component.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關使用排序和篩選搭配<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>，請參閱[如何： 排序和篩選 ADO.NET 資料使用 Windows Form BindingSource 元件](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sort-and-filter-ado-net-data-with-wf-bindingsource-component.md)。

trans-unit.source: In addition, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> component can act as a strongly typed data source.
trans-unit.target: 此外，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>元件可以做為強類型的資料來源。

trans-unit.source: Typically the type of the underlying data source is fixed through one of the following mechanisms:
trans-unit.target: 通常是透過下列機制的其中一個已修正的基礎資料來源類型：

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Add%2A> method to add an item to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> component.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Add%2A>方法，以將項目加入<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>元件。

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataSource%2A> property to a list, single object, or type.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataSource%2A>清單、 單一物件，或類型的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Both of these mechanisms create a strongly-typed list.
trans-unit.target: 這兩種機制建立強型別清單。

trans-unit.source: For more information on how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> to bind to a type, see [How to: Bind a Windows Forms Control to a Type](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-bind-a-windows-forms-control-to-a-type.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>繫結到類型時，請參閱[How to： 將 Windows Form 控制項繫結的型別](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-bind-a-windows-forms-control-to-a-type.md)。

trans-unit.source: You can also use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> to bind your controls to a factory object.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>以將控制項繫結至 factory 物件。

trans-unit.source: For more information on how to do this, see [How to: Bind a Windows Forms Control to a Factory Object](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-bind-a-windows-forms-control-to-a-factory-object.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關如何執行這項操作的詳細資訊，請參閱[How to： 將 Windows Form 控制項繫結至 Factory 物件](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-bind-a-windows-forms-control-to-a-factory-object.md)。

trans-unit.source: Because a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> handles both simple and complex data sources, terminology is problematic.
trans-unit.target: 因為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>處理這兩個簡單和複雜的資料來源，術語是有問題。

trans-unit.source: Within this class documentation, the term *list* refers to a data collection within the hosted data source, and *item* denotes a single element.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別的文件，在一詞*清單*指的是在裝載的資料來源中，資料收集和*項目*代表單一項目。

trans-unit.source: When discussing functionality associated with complex data sources, the equivalent terms *table* and *row* are used.
trans-unit.target: 當討論功能與相關聯複雜的資料來源的對等的條款*資料表*和*列*可用。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> provides members for accessing the underlying data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> 提供存取基礎資料的成員。

trans-unit.source: The current item can be retrieved through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Current%2A> property, and the entire list can be retrieved through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 目前的項目可以透過擷取<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Current%2A>屬性，並將整個清單可以透過擷取<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Editing operations are supported on the current item through <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Current%2A> and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.RemoveCurrent%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.EndEdit%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.CancelEdit%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Add%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AddNew%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 支援目前的項目，透過的編輯作業<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Current%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.RemoveCurrent%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.EndEdit%2A>，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.CancelEdit%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Add%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AddNew%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Although currency management is handled automatically for all underlying data source types, this class exposes a number of events, such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.CurrentItemChanged> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataSourceChanged>, that allow for customization.
trans-unit.target: 雖然所有基礎資料來源類型會自動處理貨幣管理，這個類別公開 （expose) 有多個事件，例如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.CurrentItemChanged>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataSourceChanged>，可讓自訂。

trans-unit.source: Data sources that are bound to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> component can also be navigated and managed with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator> class, which provides a VCR-like user interface (UI) for navigating items within a list.
trans-unit.target: 繫結至資料來源<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>元件也可瀏覽和管理與<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator>類別，可用於巡覽清單項目提供類似 VCR 的使用者介面 (UI)。

trans-unit.source: Although <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator> can be bound to any data source, it was designed to integrate with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> component through its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.BindingSource%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 雖然<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator>可以繫結到任何資料來源，其用意是要整合<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>元件透過其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingNavigator.BindingSource%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The default property for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> class is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataSource%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 預設屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>類別是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataSource%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The default event is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.CurrentChanged>.
trans-unit.target: 預設事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.CurrentChanged>。

trans-unit.source: Many of the members of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> class operate on the underlying list represented by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List%2A> property and simply refer their operation to the underlying list.
trans-unit.target: 許多成員的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>類別所代表的基礎清單操作<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List%2A>屬性，而且只是參考其基礎清單的作業。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> is bound to a custom implementation of <xref:System.Collections.IList>, the exact behavior of these members may differ from the behavior described in the class documentation.
trans-unit.target: 因此，當<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>繫結至的自訂實作<xref:System.Collections.IList>，這些成員的確切行為可能與不同類別的文件中描述的行為。

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.RemoveAt%2A> method calls <xref:System.Collections.IList.RemoveAt%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.RemoveAt%2A>方法呼叫<xref:System.Collections.IList.RemoveAt%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> documentation describes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.RemoveAt%2A> method with the understanding that the <xref:System.Collections.IList.RemoveAt%2A> method for the underlying <xref:System.Collections.IList> is correctly implemented.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>文件說明<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.RemoveAt%2A>了解的方法，<xref:System.Collections.IList.RemoveAt%2A>方法基礎<xref:System.Collections.IList>已正確地實作。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> bound to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>繫結至<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> is bound to a <xref:System.ComponentModel.BindingList%601> that contains a list of fonts.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>繫結至<xref:System.ComponentModel.BindingList%601>包含字型清單。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource" /> class to the default property values.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource" /> 類別的新執行個體成為預設屬性值。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the default <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> property values initialized by this constructor.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示預設<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>這個建構函式所初始化的屬性值。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: 屬性

trans-unit.source: Default value
trans-unit.target: 預設值

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IContainer" /> to add the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource" /> to.
trans-unit.target: 要將目前的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IContainer" /> 加入其中的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource" /> class and adds the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource" /> to the specified container.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource" /> 類別的新執行個體，並將 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource" /> 加入指定的容器中。

trans-unit.source: This constructor calls the default constructor, and then adds the current <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> to the specified container.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式呼叫預設建構函式，並將目前<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>至指定的容器。

trans-unit.source: It is not typically used by the solutions programmer, but instead by authors of design-time environments.
trans-unit.target: 它不通常是由方案程式設計人員，而是由設計階段環境的作者。

trans-unit.source: The data source for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource" /> 的資料來源。

trans-unit.source: The specific column or list name within the data source to bind to.
trans-unit.target: 要繫結至其中的資料來源內的特定資料行或清單名稱。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource" /> class with the specified data source and data member.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的資料來源和資料成員，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> to be added to the internal list.
trans-unit.target: 要加入內部清單中的 <see cref="T:System.Object" />。

trans-unit.source: Adds an existing item to the internal list.
trans-unit.target: 將現有項目加入內部清單中。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index at which <paramref name="value" /> was added to the underlying list represented by the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 以零起始的索引，<paramref name="value" /> 會在其上加入由 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List" /> 屬性所表示的基礎清單。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Add%2A> method refers the call to the underlying list's `Add` method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Add%2A>方法是指對基礎清單的呼叫`Add`方法。

trans-unit.source: The internal list must contain homogenous types.
trans-unit.target: 內部清單必須包含的同質性的類型。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataSource%2A> property has not already been set, then the first object added to the list defines the type for the list.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataSource%2A>屬性尚未設定，則加入至清單的第一個物件會定義清單的類型。

trans-unit.source: This method raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ListChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會引發<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ListChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Add%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例使用方式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Add%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste the code into a Windows Form, and call the `PopulateBindingSourceWithFonts` method from the form's constructor.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行此範例中，貼上程式碼的 Windows Form 和呼叫`PopulateBindingSourceWithFonts`從表單的建構函式的方法。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> differs in type from the existing items in the underlying list.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" />，其型別與基礎清單中現有項目的型別不同。

trans-unit.source: Occurs before an item is added to the underlying list.
trans-unit.target: 在項目加入基礎清單之前發生。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AddingNew> event occurs before a new object is added to the underlying list represented by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AddingNew>新物件加入至所代表的基礎清單之前，就會發生事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: This event is fired after the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AddNew%2A> method is called, but before the new item is created and added to the underlying list.
trans-unit.target: 這個事件一經引發之後<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AddNew%2A>呼叫方法時，之前是建立新的項目，並將其加入基礎清單。

trans-unit.source: By handling this event, the programmer can provide custom item creation and insertion behavior without being forced to derive from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> class.
trans-unit.target: 藉由處理這個事件，程式設計人員可以提供建立自訂的項目，並且插入行為，而不用強制衍生自<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>類別。

trans-unit.source: This is accomplished in the event handler by setting the <xref:System.ComponentModel.AddingNewEventArgs.NewObject%2A> property of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.AddingNewEventArgs?displayProperty=nameWithType> parameter to the new item.
trans-unit.target: 這會透過事件處理常式中設定<xref:System.ComponentModel.AddingNewEventArgs.NewObject%2A>屬性<xref:System.ComponentModel.AddingNewEventArgs?displayProperty=nameWithType>參數，以新的項目。

trans-unit.source: The new object created in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AddingNew> event must be of the same type as the type contained in the list or an exception will occur.
trans-unit.target: 在中建立新物件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AddingNew>事件必須是相同的型別清單中所包含的類型，或會發生例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: You cannot set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.AddingNewEventArgs.NewObject%2A> property when bound to a <xref:System.Data.DataView> or <xref:System.Data.DataTable> because you cannot add a new <xref:System.Data.DataRowView> to the list.
trans-unit.target: 您不能設定<xref:System.ComponentModel.AddingNewEventArgs.NewObject%2A>當繫結至屬性<xref:System.Data.DataView>或<xref:System.Data.DataTable>因為您無法新增新<xref:System.Data.DataRowView>至清單。

trans-unit.source: For more information about supplying custom new item functionality, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AddNew%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關如何提供自訂的新項目功能的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AddNew%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> component to bind a list to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>元件繫結至清單<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: New items are added to the list by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AddingNew> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 新的項目加入清單<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AddingNew>事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided in [How to: Customize Item Addition with the Windows Forms BindingSource](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-customize-item-addition-with-the-windows-forms-bindingsource.md).
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分[How to： 使用 Windows Form BindingSource 自訂項目加入](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-customize-item-addition-with-the-windows-forms-bindingsource.md)。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="P:System.ComponentModel.AddingNewEventArgs.NewObject" /> is not the same type as the type contained in the list.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.ComponentModel.AddingNewEventArgs.NewObject" /> 的型別與清單中所包含的型別不同。

trans-unit.source: Adds a new item to the underlying list.
trans-unit.target: 將新的項目加入基礎清單中。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that was created and added to the list.
trans-unit.target: 已建立並且加入至清單中的 <see cref="T:System.Object" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AddNew%2A> method adds a new item to the underlying list represented by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AddNew%2A>方法會將新的項目加入基礎清單由<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: This method sets up the following series of actions:
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會設定下列一系列動作：

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.EndEdit%2A> method is automatically called to commit any pending edit operations.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.EndEdit%2A>認可任何暫止的編輯作業會自動呼叫方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AddingNew> event is automatically raised.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AddingNew>自動引發事件。

trans-unit.source: This event can be programmatically handled to construct the new item.
trans-unit.target: 可以透過程式設計方式處理這個事件，以建構新的項目。

trans-unit.source: This is accomplished in the event handler by setting the <xref:System.ComponentModel.AddingNewEventArgs.NewObject%2A> property of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.AddingNewEventArgs?displayProperty=nameWithType> parameter to the new item.
trans-unit.target: 這會透過事件處理常式中設定<xref:System.ComponentModel.AddingNewEventArgs.NewObject%2A>屬性<xref:System.ComponentModel.AddingNewEventArgs?displayProperty=nameWithType>參數，以新的項目。

trans-unit.source: The new object created in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AddingNew> event must be of the same type as the type contained in the list or an exception will occur.
trans-unit.target: 在中建立新物件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AddingNew>事件必須是相同的型別清單中所包含的類型，或會發生例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AddingNew> event is not handled, and the underlying list is an <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList>, then the request is passed to the list's <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.AddNew%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AddingNew>不處理事件，以及基礎清單<xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList>，則要求會傳遞給清單的<xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.AddNew%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: If the underlying list is not an <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList>, the item is automatically created through its public default constructor.
trans-unit.target: 如果基礎清單不是 <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList>，則會透過其公用預設建構函式自動建立項目。

trans-unit.source: In either case, the new item is added to the end of the list.
trans-unit.target: 在任一情況下，新的項目加入清單的結尾。

trans-unit.source: The new item is added immediately to the internal list unless the data source implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableObject> interface.
trans-unit.target: 新的項目立即新增到內部清單除非資料來源實作<xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableObject>介面。

trans-unit.source: In this case, the new item is not committed until an explicit call to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.System%23ComponentModel%23ICancelAddNew%23EndNew%2A> is made or until a new list operation is initiated.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，新的項目也不會認可明確呼叫直到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.System%23ComponentModel%23ICancelAddNew%23EndNew%2A>進行或起始新的清單作業之前。

trans-unit.source: Before it is committed, the new item can be rolled back by calling <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.CancelEdit%2A>, in which case the new item is discarded.
trans-unit.target: 它已經通過認可之前，新的項目可以回復藉由呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.CancelEdit%2A>，在此情況下會捨棄新的項目。

trans-unit.source: This method raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ListChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會引發<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ListChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> component to bind a list to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>元件繫結至清單<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: New items are added to the list by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AddingNew> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 新的項目加入清單<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AddingNew>事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided in [How to: Customize Item Addition with the Windows Forms BindingSource](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-customize-item-addition-with-the-windows-forms-bindingsource.md).
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分[How to： 使用 Windows Form BindingSource 自訂項目加入](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-customize-item-addition-with-the-windows-forms-bindingsource.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AllowNew" /> property is set to <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AllowNew" /> 屬性設定為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
A public default constructor could not be found for the current item type.
trans-unit.target: 目前項目型別找不到公用預設的建構函式。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether items in the underlying list can be edited.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出基礎清單中的項目是否可以編輯。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to indicate list items can be edited; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示可以編輯清單項目，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AllowEdit%2A> property is typically used by other components to determine if editing of items in the list is allowed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AllowEdit%2A>屬性由其他元件通常用來判斷是否允許編輯的清單中的項目。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AddNew" /> method can be used to add items to the list.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AddNew" /> 方法是否可以用來將項目加入清單中。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AddNew" /> can be used to add items to the list; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AddNew" /> 可以用來將項目加入清單中，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AllowNew%2A> property depends on the underlying data source type.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AllowNew%2A>屬性相依於基礎資料來源類型。

trans-unit.source: If the underlying list implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList> interface, this property will delegate to the underlying list.
trans-unit.target: 如果基礎清單實作<xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList>介面，這個屬性才會委派至基礎清單。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, this property will return `false` if the underlying list has any of the following characteristics:
trans-unit.target: 否則，這個屬性會傳回`false`如果基礎清單有任何下列特性：

trans-unit.source: It has a fixed size, as determined by the <xref:System.Collections.IList.IsFixedSize%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 它有固定的大小，由<xref:System.Collections.IList.IsFixedSize%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性。

trans-unit.source: It is read-only, as determined by the <xref:System.Collections.IList.IsReadOnly%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 它是唯讀的由<xref:System.Collections.IList.IsReadOnly%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The item's type does not have a default constructor.
trans-unit.target: 項目的型別沒有預設建構函式。

trans-unit.source: Once the value of this property is set, the getter no longer refers the call to the underlying list.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值設定之後，getter 便不再參考基礎清單的呼叫。

trans-unit.source: Instead, it simply returns the value that was previously set until the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ResetAllowNew%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: 相反地，它只會傳回值，直到先前設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ResetAllowNew%2A>方法呼叫。

trans-unit.source: Setting this property raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ListChanged> event with <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListChangedEventArgs.ListChangedType?displayProperty=nameWithType> set to <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListChangedType.Reset?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 設定此屬性將會引發<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ListChanged>事件<xref:System.ComponentModel.ListChangedEventArgs.ListChangedType?displayProperty=nameWithType>設<xref:System.ComponentModel.ListChangedType.Reset?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: If you set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AllowNew%2A> property to `true` and the underlying list type does not have a default constructor, you must handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AddingNew> event and create the appropriate type.
trans-unit.target: 如果您設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AllowNew%2A>屬性`true`基礎清單類型沒有預設建構函式，您必須處理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AddingNew>事件，並建立適當的型別。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AllowNew%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> component to permit the user to add new items to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> component's underlying list.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AllowNew%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>元件，以允許加入新項目到使用者<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>元件的基礎清單。

trans-unit.source: Setting this property to `true` causes the bound <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control to display its row for new records.
trans-unit.target: 此屬性設定為`true`會使繫結<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制項來顯示新記錄其資料列。

trans-unit.source: This property is set to <see langword="true" /> when the underlying list represented by the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List" /> property has a fixed size or is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 當由 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List" /> 屬性表示的基礎清單有固定大小或者是唯讀的，這個屬性就會設定為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: The property is set to <see langword="true" /> and the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AddingNew" /> event is not handled when the underlying list type does not have a default constructor.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會設定為 <see langword="true" />，而且當基礎清單型別沒有預設的建構函式時，將不會處理 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AddingNew" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether items can be removed from the underlying list.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否可以從基礎清單中移除項目。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to indicate list items can be removed from the list; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示可以從清單移除清單項目，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AllowRemove%2A> property is typically used by other components to determine if editing of items in the list is allowed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AllowRemove%2A>屬性由其他元件通常用來判斷是否允許編輯的清單中的項目。

trans-unit.source: Sorts the data source with the specified sort description or descriptions.
trans-unit.target: 使用一或多個指定的排序描述，對資料來源排序。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescriptionCollection" /> containing the sort descriptions to apply to the data source.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescriptionCollection" />，包含要套用至資料來源的排序描述。

trans-unit.source: Sorts the data source with the specified sort descriptions.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的排序描述，對資料來源排序。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingListView> implements multi-column sorting as a set of property descriptor-direction pairs.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingListView> 實作多欄排序為一組屬性描述元方向組。

trans-unit.source: The data source is not an <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IBindingListView" />.
trans-unit.target: 資料來源不是 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IBindingListView" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor" /> that describes the property by which to sort the data source.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor" />，描述排序資料來源所依據的屬性。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ListSortDirection" /> indicating how the list should be sorted.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ListSortDirection" />，指出應該如何排序清單。

trans-unit.source: Sorts the data source using the specified property descriptor and sort direction.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的屬性描述項和排序方向，對資料來源排序。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList> implements single column sorting using a <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor> to indicate a property to sort by and a <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListSortDirection> indicating whether the property contents should be sorted in ascending or descending order.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList>實作使用單一資料行排序<xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor>表示依排序的屬性和<xref:System.ComponentModel.ListSortDirection>指出是否應該以遞增或遞減順序排序屬性內容。

trans-unit.source: The data source is not an <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList" />.
trans-unit.target: 資料來源不是 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList" />。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when all the clients have been bound to this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource" />.
trans-unit.target: 發生於所有的用戶端都已繫結至這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource" /> 時。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.BindingComplete> event occurs after all the clients, typically controls, have been bound to the current <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.BindingComplete>之後的所有用戶端，就會發生事件通常控制項已繫結至目前<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>。

trans-unit.source: The handler of this event can take the appropriate action based on the success, error, or exceptions in the binding process, by examining the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingCompleteEventArgs.BindingCompleteState%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingCompleteEventArgs> parameter.
trans-unit.target: 此事件處理常式可以採取適當的動作成功、 錯誤或例外狀況中的繫結程序中，根據檢查<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingCompleteEventArgs.BindingCompleteState%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingCompleteEventArgs>參數。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates handling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.BindingComplete> event.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範處理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.BindingComplete>事件。

trans-unit.source: To run this code, paste it into an empty code file.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行此程式碼，請將它貼到空白程式碼檔案。

trans-unit.source: Cancels the current edit operation.
trans-unit.target: 取消目前的編輯作業。

trans-unit.source: This method discards modifications to data since the last save or load operation if both of the following conditions are met:
trans-unit.target: 自上次儲存或載入作業，這兩個下列條件符合時，這個方法會捨棄對資料的修改：

trans-unit.source: The data source implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableObject> interface.
trans-unit.target: 資料來源實作<xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableObject>介面。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.EndEdit%2A> method has not been called yet.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.EndEdit%2A>方法尚未呼叫。

trans-unit.source: This method calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.CancelCurrentEdit%2A> method of the underlying <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>, and is scoped to row-level changes.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.CancelCurrentEdit%2A>方法基礎<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>，並以資料列層級變更為範圍。

trans-unit.source: Removes all elements from the list.
trans-unit.target: 將所有項目從清單中移除。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Clear%2A> method removes all elements from the underlying list represented by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List%2A> property and sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Count%2A> property to zero.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Clear%2A>方法所代表的基礎清單中移除所有項目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List%2A>屬性和集合<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Count%2A>屬性為零。

trans-unit.source: This method raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ListChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會引發<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ListChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Object" /> to locate in the underlying list represented by the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 要在 <see cref="T:System.Object" /> 屬性表示的基礎清單中尋找的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List" />。

trans-unit.source: The value can be <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個值可以是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether an object is an item in the list.
trans-unit.target: 判斷某個物件是否為清單中的項目。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <paramref name="value" /> parameter is found in the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果在 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List" /> 中找到 <paramref name="value" /> 參數，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Although the implementation is dependent on the underlying list's `Contains` method, typically the following characteristics apply:
trans-unit.target: 雖然實作與否取決於基礎清單`Contains`方法，通常具有下列特性：

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List%2A> is searched starting at the first element and ending at the last element.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List%2A> 會搜尋第一個項目開始和結束時間的最後一個元素。

trans-unit.source: The underlying method performs a linear search; therefore, the average execution time is proportional to the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Count%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 此基礎的方法會執行線性搜尋;因此，平均執行時間是成比例的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Count%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The underlying method determines equality by calling the <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 基礎的方法可判斷是否相等藉由呼叫<xref:System.Object.Equals%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The destination array.
trans-unit.target: 目的陣列。

trans-unit.source: The index in the destination array at which to start the copy operation.
trans-unit.target: 要開始複製作業之目的陣列中的索引。

trans-unit.source: Copies the contents of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List" /> to the specified array, starting at the specified index value.
trans-unit.target: 從指定的索引值開始，將 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List" /> 的內容複製至指定的陣列。

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to combine items from multiple sources into a single array.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個方法將多個來源的項目結合成單一陣列。

trans-unit.source: Gets the total number of items in the underlying list, taking the current <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Filter" /> value into consideration.
trans-unit.target: 將目前的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Filter" /> 值納入考慮，取得基本清單中的項目總數。

trans-unit.source: The total number of filtered items in the underlying list.
trans-unit.target: 基礎清單中的篩選項目總數。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Count%2A> property gets the number of items in the underlying list represented by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List%2A> property as modified by the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Filter%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Count%2A>屬性所代表的基礎清單中取得的項目數<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List%2A>屬性已修改過的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Filter%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.RemoveAt%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Count%2A> members.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.RemoveAt%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Count%2A>成員。

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste the code into a form that contains a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> named `BindingSource1`, two labels named `label1` and `label2`, and a button named `button1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行此範例中，貼上程式碼包含表單的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>名為`BindingSource1`，兩個標籤命名為`label1`和`label2`，和名為按鈕`button1`。

trans-unit.source: Associate the `button1_Click` method with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click> event for `button1`.
trans-unit.target: 關聯`button1_Click`方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click>事件`button1`。

trans-unit.source: Visual Basic users will need to add a reference to System.Data.dll.
trans-unit.target: Visual Basic 使用者必須加入 System.Data.dll 的參考。

trans-unit.source: Gets the currency manager associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得與這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource" /> 關聯的 Currency 管理員。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager" /> associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource" />.
trans-unit.target: 與這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager" /> 相關聯的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource" />。

trans-unit.source: If you want to access the currency manager for another binding to the same data member use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.GetRelatedCurrencyManager%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要存取另一個繫結至相同的資料成員使用的貨幣管理員<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.GetRelatedCurrencyManager%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets the current item in the list.
trans-unit.target: 取得清單中的目前項目。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that represents the current item in the underlying list represented by the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List" /> property, or <see langword="null" /> if the list has no items.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Object" />，表示由 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List" /> 屬性所表示的基礎清單中的目前項目；如果該清單沒有任何項目，則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Current%2A> property to access the current item, but use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List%2A> property to get the entire list.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Current%2A>屬性來存取目前的項目，但是會使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List%2A>屬性來取得整個清單。

trans-unit.source: To determine the type of the current object, use the <xref:System.Object.GetType%2A>, or <xref:System.Object.ToString%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 若要判斷目前物件的類型，請使用<xref:System.Object.GetType%2A>，或<xref:System.Object.ToString%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: To change the current item, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Position%2A> property to a new integral value, or use one of the navigation methods such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.MoveNext%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要變更目前的項目，設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Position%2A>屬性，以新的整數值或這類的巡覽方法的其中一個使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.MoveNext%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Current%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Current%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste the code into a form and call the `PopulateBindingSourceWithFonts` method from the form's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load> event handling method.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行此範例中，將程式碼貼到表單，並呼叫`PopulateBindingSourceWithFonts`方法從表單的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load>事件處理方法。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the currently bound item changes.
trans-unit.target: 發生於目前繫結的項目變更時。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.CurrentChanged> event is raised whenever the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Current%2A> property changes for any of the following reasons:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.CurrentChanged>就會引發事件時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Current%2A>屬性變更，基於下列原因：

trans-unit.source: The current position of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List%2A> changes.
trans-unit.target: 目前的位置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List%2A>變更。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataSource%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataMember%2A> properties change.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataSource%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataMember%2A>屬性變更。

trans-unit.source: The membership of the underlying <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List%2A> changes, which causes <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Position%2A> to refer to a different item.
trans-unit.target: 基礎的成員資格<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List%2A>變更時，這會導致<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Position%2A>以參考不同的項目。

trans-unit.source: Examples include adding or deleting an item before the current item, deleting or moving the current item itself, or moving an item to the current position.
trans-unit.target: 範例包括新增或刪除目前的項目，刪除或移動目前的項目本身，或將項目移至目前位置前面的項目。

trans-unit.source: The underlying list is refreshed by a new sorting or filtering operation.
trans-unit.target: 重新整理基礎清單的新排序或篩選作業。

trans-unit.source: When this event is triggered, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Current%2A> property will already contain its new value.
trans-unit.target: 觸發此事件時，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Current%2A>屬性將已包含新的值。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.CurrentChanged> is the default event for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.CurrentChanged> 是預設事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>類別。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a property value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Current" /> property has changed.
trans-unit.target: 發生於 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Current" /> 屬性的屬性值已變更時。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.CurrentItemChanged> event is raised in response to all of the circumstances that raise the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.CurrentChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.CurrentItemChanged>引發以回應所有引發的情況<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.CurrentChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: Additionally, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.CurrentItemChanged> is also fired whenever the value of one of the properties of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Current%2A> is changed.
trans-unit.target: 此外，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.CurrentItemChanged>也時引發的其中一個屬性的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Current%2A>變更。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a currency-related exception is silently handled by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource" />.
trans-unit.target: 當 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource" /> 以無訊息模式處理與貨幣有關的例外狀況時發生。

trans-unit.source: This event is informational and reports CLS-compliant exceptions only.
trans-unit.target: 此事件僅提供資訊，並報告僅符合 CLS 標準的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: To determine what type of exception occurred, handle this event and check the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerDataErrorEventArgs.Exception%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerDataErrorEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: 若要判斷發生何種類型的例外狀況，處理這個事件，並檢查<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerDataErrorEventArgs.Exception%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerDataErrorEventArgs>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the specific list in the data source to which the connector currently binds to.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定此連接器目前繫結至的資料來源中的特定清單。

trans-unit.source: The name of a list (or row) in the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataSource" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataSource" /> 中的清單 (或資料列) 的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 預設為空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataSource%2A> contains multiple lists (or tables) of data, you should set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataMember%2A> property to the name of one of the sources.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataSource%2A>包含多個清單 （或資料表） 的資料，您應該設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataMember%2A>屬性設為其中一個來源的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Setting this property raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataMemberChanged> event
trans-unit.target: 設定此屬性將會引發<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataMemberChanged>事件

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataMember" /> property value has changed.
trans-unit.target: 發生於 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataMember" /> 屬性值變更時。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataMemberChanged> event occurs after the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataMember%2A> property changes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataMemberChanged>之後就會發生事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataMember%2A>屬性變更。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the data source that the connector binds to.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定此連結器所繫結至的資料來源。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that acts as a data source.
trans-unit.target: 當做資料來源的 <see cref="T:System.Object" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataSource%2A> property can be set to a number of data sources, including types, objects, and lists of types.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataSource%2A>屬性可以設定為資料來源，包括類型、 物件和型別清單的數目。

trans-unit.source: The resulting data source will be exposed as a list.
trans-unit.target: 產生的資料來源會公開為清單。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows some of the common data sources and the resulting list evaluation.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示一些常見的資料來源和產生的清單評估。

trans-unit.source: DataSource property
trans-unit.target: 資料來源屬性

trans-unit.source: List results
trans-unit.target: 結果清單

trans-unit.source: An empty <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList> of objects.
trans-unit.target: 空白<xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList>的物件。

trans-unit.source: Adding an item sets the list to the type of the added item.
trans-unit.target: 加入項目類型的已加入的項目設定的清單。

trans-unit.source: `null` with <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataMember%2A> set
trans-unit.target: `null` 與<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataMember%2A>設定

trans-unit.source: Not supported, raises <xref:System.ArgumentException>.
trans-unit.target: 不支援，會引發<xref:System.ArgumentException>。

trans-unit.source: Non-list type or object of type "T"
trans-unit.target: 非清單型別或型別"T"的物件

trans-unit.source: Empty <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList> of type "T".
trans-unit.target: 空白<xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList>的型別"T"。

trans-unit.source: Array instance
trans-unit.target: 陣列執行個體

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList> containing the array elements.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList> 包含陣列項目。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> instance
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> 執行個體

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList> containing the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> items.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList>包含<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>項目。

trans-unit.source: List instance containing type "T"
trans-unit.target: 包含清單執行個體型別"T"

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList> instance containing type "T".
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList> 包含型別"T"執行個體。

trans-unit.source: In addition, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataSource%2A> can be set to other list types such as <xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource> and <xref:System.ComponentModel.ITypedList> and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> will handle them appropriately.
trans-unit.target: 此外，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataSource%2A>可以設定為其他清單類型例如<xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource>和<xref:System.ComponentModel.ITypedList>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>會適當地處理它們。

trans-unit.source: In this case, the type contained in the list should have a default constructor.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，清單中所包含的類型應該有預設建構函式。

trans-unit.source: When setting a data source, if the supplied reference contains more than one list or table, you must set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataMember%2A> property to a string that specifies the list to bind to.
trans-unit.target: 當設定資料來源，如果提供的參考都包含一個以上的清單或資料表時，您必須設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataMember%2A>屬性設為字串，指定要繫結至清單。

trans-unit.source: Setting this property raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataSourceChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 設定此屬性將會引發<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataSourceChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: If you make any changes to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataSource%2A> property value, you should do so on the user interface (UI) thread to ensure that the UI reflects the changes.
trans-unit.target: 如果您進行任何變更<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataSource%2A>屬性值，則應如此做以確保 UI 反映這些變更在使用者介面 (UI) 執行緒上。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataSource%2A> property is the default property for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataSource%2A>屬性是預設屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>類別。

trans-unit.source: The following code example assigns a list of customers to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataSource%2A> of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> component.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會將指派的客戶清單<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataSource%2A>的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>元件。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided at [How to: Raise Change Notifications Using the BindingSource ResetItem Method](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-raise-change-notifications-using-the-bindingsource-resetitem-method.md).
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是在所提供之較大範例的一部分[How to： 使用 BindingSource ResetItem 方法引發變更通知](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-raise-change-notifications-using-the-bindingsource-resetitem-method.md)。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataSource" /> property value has changed.
trans-unit.target: 發生於 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataSource" /> 屬性值變更時。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataSourceChanged> event occurs after the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataSource%2A> property changes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataSourceChanged>之後就會發生事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataSource%2A>屬性變更。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <see langword="false" /> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示釋放 Managed 和 Unmanaged 資源，<see langword="false" /> 則表示只釋放 Unmanaged 資源。

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource" /> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: 釋放 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource" /> 所使用的 Unmanaged 資源，並選擇性地釋放 Managed 資源。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會呼叫公用`Dispose`方法和<xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: `Dispose` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose` 叫用受保護`Dispose(Boolean)`方法`disposing`參數設定為`true`。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> 叫用`Dispose`與`disposing`設`false`。

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> references.
trans-unit.target: 當`disposing`參數為 true，這個方法的任何 managed 物件所持有的資源全部釋出這個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>參考。

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會叫用每個參考物件的 `Dispose` 方法。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="Dispose" /> can be called multiple times by other objects.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Dispose" /> 可以被其他物件呼叫多次。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" /> be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to <see langword="Dispose" />.
trans-unit.target: 在覆寫<see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />小心不要參考物件已處置過的早期呼叫中<see langword="Dispose" />。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to implement <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />, see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關如何實作<see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />，請參閱[實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

trans-unit.source: For more information about <see langword="Dispose" /> and <see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" />, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關<see langword="Dispose" />和<see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" />，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[覆寫 Finalize 方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。

trans-unit.source: Applies pending changes to the underlying data source.
trans-unit.target: 將暫止的變更套用至基礎資料來源。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.EndEdit%2A> method is called, all pending changes are applied to the underlying data source.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.EndEdit%2A>呼叫方法時，所有暫止的變更套用至基礎資料來源。

trans-unit.source: This method has no effect unless the objects contained by the data source implement the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableObject> interface.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法沒有任何作用，除非資料來源所包含的物件實作<xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableObject>介面。

trans-unit.source: If the objects do not implement the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableObject> interface, changes to the data are copied to the underlying data source immediately after each change.
trans-unit.target: 如果物件不會實作<xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableObject>介面，資料變更的每個變更之後立即複製到基礎資料來源。

trans-unit.source: This method raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ListChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會引發<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ListChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the expression used to filter which rows are viewed.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定用來篩選檢視的資料列的運算式。

trans-unit.source: A string that specifies how rows are to be filtered.
trans-unit.target: 字串，指定資料列的篩選方式。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Typically used in complex data-binding scenarios, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Filter%2A> property allows you to view a subset of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataSource%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 通常用於複雜資料繫結案例中，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Filter%2A>屬性可讓您檢視的子集<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataSource%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Only underlying lists that implement the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingListView> interface support filtering.
trans-unit.target: 只有基礎列出可實作<xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingListView>介面支援篩選。

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Filter%2A> is not `null`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> passes this property to the underlying list.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Filter%2A>不`null`、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>將這個屬性傳遞至基礎清單。

trans-unit.source: If you set this property during object initialization, the call will be deferred until after initialization is complete.
trans-unit.target: 如果您在物件初始化期間設定此屬性，呼叫將會延遲到，已完成初始設定之後。

trans-unit.source: To form a filter value, specify the name of a column followed by an operator and a value to filter on.
trans-unit.target: 若要形成篩選值，指定的名稱後面接著一個運算子和值做為篩選條件的資料行。

trans-unit.source: The accepted filter syntax depends on the underlying data source.
trans-unit.target: 接受的篩選條件語法取決於基礎資料來源。

trans-unit.source: If the underlying data source is a <xref:System.Data.DataSet>, <xref:System.Data.DataTable>, or <xref:System.Data.DataView>, you can specify Boolean expressions using the syntax documented for the <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.Expression%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果基礎資料來源是<xref:System.Data.DataSet>， <xref:System.Data.DataTable>，或<xref:System.Data.DataView>，您可以指定使用如所述的語法的布林運算式<xref:System.Data.DataColumn.Expression%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Filter%2A> property affects the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Count%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Filter%2A>屬性會影響值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Count%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Additionally, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Filter%2A> value will persist when the data source changes.
trans-unit.target: 此外，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Filter%2A>值將會保存資料來源變更時。

trans-unit.source: To stop filtering the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataSource%2A>, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.RemoveFilter%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要停止篩選<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataSource%2A>，呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.RemoveFilter%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Filter%2A> property with a <xref:System.Data.DataView>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Filter%2A>屬性<xref:System.Data.DataView>。

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste the code into a Windows Form and call `PopulateDataViewAndFilter` from the form's constructor or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load> event-handling method.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行此範例中，貼上程式碼的 Windows Form 和呼叫`PopulateDataViewAndFilter`從表單的建構函式或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load>事件處理方法。

trans-unit.source: Your form should import the <xref:System.Xml> and <xref:System.IO> namespaces.
trans-unit.target: 應該先匯入您的表單<xref:System.Xml>和<xref:System.IO>命名空間。

trans-unit.source: Find the specified item in the data source.
trans-unit.target: 尋找資料來源中的指定項目。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor" /> to search for.
trans-unit.target: 要搜尋的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor" />。

trans-unit.source: The value of <c>prop</c> to match.
trans-unit.target: 要比對的 <c>prop</c> 值。

trans-unit.source: Searches for the index of the item that has the given property descriptor.
trans-unit.target: 搜尋具有指定屬性描述項的項目之索引。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the item that has the given value for <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor" />.
trans-unit.target: 具有 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor" /> 指定值的項目之以零起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: This method is typically used in complex data-binding cases to locate the first row where the value of the field specified by the `prop` parameter equals the value of the `key` parameter
trans-unit.target: 這個方法通常用於複雜資料繫結的情況下若要找出欄位的值會由第一個資料列`prop`參數等於值`key`參數

trans-unit.source: This method simply refers the request to the underlying list's <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.Find%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法只是指要求基礎清單<xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.Find%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the underlying data source is a <xref:System.Data.DataSet>, <xref:System.Data.DataTable>, or <xref:System.Data.DataView>, this method calls the <xref:System.Data.DataView.System%23ComponentModel%23IBindingList%23Find%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果基礎資料來源是<xref:System.Data.DataSet>， <xref:System.Data.DataTable>，或<xref:System.Data.DataView>，這個方法會呼叫<xref:System.Data.DataView.System%23ComponentModel%23IBindingList%23Find%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: The behavior of <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.Find%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, such as the value returned if no matching item is found, depends on the implementation of the method in the underlying list.
trans-unit.target: 行為<xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.Find%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>，例如，如果找到相符的項目，取決於基礎清單中方法的實作傳回的值。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Find%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會示範如何使用 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Find%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: For the complete example see the class overview topic.
trans-unit.target: 如需完整範例，請參閱類別概觀主題。

trans-unit.source: The underlying list is not of type <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList" />.
trans-unit.target: 基礎清單不是型別 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList" />。

trans-unit.source: The name of the property to search for.
trans-unit.target: 要搜尋的屬性名稱。

trans-unit.source: The value of the item with the specified <c>propertyName</c> to find.
trans-unit.target: 具有要尋找的指定 <c>propertyName</c> 的項目之值。

trans-unit.source: Returns the index of the item in the list with the specified property name and value.
trans-unit.target: 傳回清單中具有指定屬性名稱和值的項目之索引。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the item with the specified property name and value.
trans-unit.target: 具有指定屬性名稱和值的項目之以零為起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Find%2A> method can only be used when the underlying list is an <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList> with searching implemented.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Find%2A>方法只可用基礎清單時，<xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList>搜尋實作。

trans-unit.source: This method simply refers the request to the underlying list's <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.Find%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法只是指要求基礎清單<xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.Find%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the underlying data source is a <xref:System.Data.DataSet>, <xref:System.Data.DataTable>, or <xref:System.Data.DataView>, this method converts `propertyName` to a <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor> and calls the <xref:System.Data.DataView.System%23ComponentModel%23IBindingList%23Find%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果基礎資料來源是<xref:System.Data.DataSet>， <xref:System.Data.DataTable>，或<xref:System.Data.DataView>，這個方法會將轉換`propertyName`來<xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor>並呼叫<xref:System.Data.DataView.System%23ComponentModel%23IBindingList%23Find%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The behavior of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Find%2A>, such as the value returned if no matching item is found, depends on the implementation of the method in the underlying list.
trans-unit.target: 行為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Find%2A>，例如，如果找到相符的項目，取決於基礎清單中方法的實作傳回的值。

trans-unit.source: The property name comparison is case-insensitive.
trans-unit.target: 屬性名稱的比較不區分大小寫。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Find%2A> method with a <xref:System.Data.DataView>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Find%2A>方法<xref:System.Data.DataView>。

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste the code into a Windows Form and call `PopulateDataViewAndFind` from the form's constructor or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load> event-handling method.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行此範例中，貼上程式碼的 Windows Form 和呼叫`PopulateDataViewAndFind`從表單的建構函式或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load>事件處理方法。

trans-unit.source: Your form should import the <xref:System.Xml> and <xref:System.IO> namespaces.
trans-unit.target: 應該先匯入您的表單<xref:System.Xml>和<xref:System.IO>命名空間。

trans-unit.source: The underlying list is not a <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList" /> with searching functionality implemented.
trans-unit.target: 基礎清單不是有實作搜尋功能的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="propertyName" /> does not match a property in the list.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="propertyName" /> 不符合清單中的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves an enumerator for the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List" />.
trans-unit.target: 擷取 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List" /> 的列舉值。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" /> for the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" /> 的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List" />。

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor" /> objects to find in the list as bindable.
trans-unit.target: 要在可繫結清單中尋找之 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor" /> 物件的陣列。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves an array of <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor" /> objects representing the bindable properties of the data source list type.
trans-unit.target: 擷取 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor" /> 物件的陣列，表示資料來源清單型別的可繫結屬性。

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor" /> objects that represents the properties on this list type used to bind data.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor" /> 物件的陣列，表示這個清單型別上用於繫結資料的屬性。

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor" /> objects to find in the list as bindable.
trans-unit.target: 要在可繫結清單中尋找之 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor" /> 物件的陣列。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the list supplying data for the binding.
trans-unit.target: 取得為繫結提供資料的清單名稱。

trans-unit.source: The name of the list supplying the data for binding.
trans-unit.target: 為繫結提供資料的清單名稱。

trans-unit.source: The name of column or list, within the data source to retrieve the currency manager for.
trans-unit.target: 資料來源中資料行或清單的名稱，要為其擷取 Currency 管理員。

trans-unit.source: Gets the related currency manager for the specified data member.
trans-unit.target: 取得指定之資料成員的相關 Currency 管理員。

trans-unit.source: The related <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager" /> for the specified data member.
trans-unit.target: 指定資料成員的相關 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager" />。

trans-unit.source: If `dataMember` is `null` or an empty string (""), <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.GetRelatedCurrencyManager%2A> returns the main currency manager; otherwise, it checks for another <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> bound to the specified data member and returns its currency manager.
trans-unit.target: 如果`dataMember`是`null`或空字串 ("")，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.GetRelatedCurrencyManager%2A>傳回主要 currency 管理員。否則，它會檢查是否有另一個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>繫結至指定的資料成員，並傳回其 currency 管理員。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Object" /> to locate in the underlying list represented by the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 要在 <see cref="T:System.Object" /> 屬性表示的基礎清單中尋找的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List" />。

trans-unit.source: The value can be <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個值可以是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Searches for the specified object and returns the index of the first occurrence within the entire list.
trans-unit.target: 搜尋指定的物件，並傳回整個清單中第一個相符項目的索引。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the first occurrence of the <paramref name="value" /> parameter; otherwise, -1 if <paramref name="value" /> is not in the list.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 參數的第一個相符項目之以零起始的索引；如果 <paramref name="value" /> 不在清單中，則為 -1。

trans-unit.source: Although the implementation is dependent on the underlying list's `IndexOf` method, typically the following characteristics apply:
trans-unit.target: 雖然實作與否取決於基礎清單`IndexOf`方法，通常具有下列特性：

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List%2A> is searched starting at the first element and ending at the last element.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List%2A>會搜尋第一個項目開始和結束時間的最後一個元素。

trans-unit.source: The underlying method performs a linear search; therefore, the average execution time is proportional to the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Count%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 此基礎的方法會執行線性搜尋;因此，平均執行時間是成比例的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Count%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The underlying method determines equality by calling the <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 基礎的方法可判斷是否相等藉由呼叫<xref:System.Object.Equals%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index at which <c>value</c> should be inserted.
trans-unit.target: 應該插入 <c>value</c> 之以零啟始的索引。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Object" /> to insert.
trans-unit.target: 要插入的 <see cref="T:System.Object" />。

trans-unit.source: The value can be <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個值可以是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Inserts an item into the list at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 將項目插入位於指定索引的清單中。

trans-unit.source: This method raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ListChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會引發<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ListChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> is less than zero or greater than <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Count" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> 小於零或大於 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Count" />。

trans-unit.source: The list is read-only or has a fixed size.
trans-unit.target: 此清單是唯讀的，或具有固定大小。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the list binding is suspended.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出清單繫結是否已暫止。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to indicate the binding is suspended; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示繫結已暫止，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the underlying list has a fixed size.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出基礎清單是否有固定的大小。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the underlying list has a fixed size; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果基礎清單有固定大小，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: If the list has a fixed size, it does not allow the addition or removal of elements after the list has been created, but you can modify existing elements.
trans-unit.target: 如果清單有固定的大小，它不允許加入或移除項目後建立清單之後，但您可以修改現有的項目。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the underlying list is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出基礎清單是否為唯讀。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the list is read-only; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果清單是唯讀的，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: A list that is read-only does not allow the addition, removal, or modification of any list items after the list is created.
trans-unit.target: 是唯讀的清單不允許清單建立後增加、 移除或修改任何清單項目。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the items in the underlying list are sorted.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出基礎清單中的項目是否已排序。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the list is an <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList" /> and is sorted; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果清單為 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList" /> 並已排序，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.IsSorted%2A> always returns `false` if the list is not an <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.IsSorted%2A> 一律傳回`false`如果清單不是<xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether access to the collection is synchronized (thread safe).
trans-unit.target: 取得值，表示是否同步化存取集合 (執行緒安全)。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to indicate the list is synchronized; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示清單已同步化，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the element to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: 要擷取的項目之以零為起始索引。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the list element at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定指定索引中的清單項目。

trans-unit.source: The element at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 在指定索引上的項目。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Item%2A> property represents the indexer for this class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Item%2A>屬性表示這個類別的索引子。

trans-unit.source: It accepts `null` as a valid value and allows duplicate items within the list.
trans-unit.target: 它可接受`null`有效的值，並允許清單內的重複項目。
