trans-unit.source: Setting a value will raise the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ListChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 設定值，將會引發<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ListChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> is less than zero or is equal to or greater than <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Count" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> 小於零或是等於或大於 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Count" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the list that the connector is bound to.
trans-unit.target: 取得連接器要繫結至其中的清單。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IList" /> that represents the list, or <see langword="null" /> if there is no underlying list associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource" />.
trans-unit.target: 表示此清單的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.IList" />；如果沒有與此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource" /> 關聯的基礎清單，則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> class uniformly handles different data sources.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>類別一致的方式處理不同的資料來源。

trans-unit.source: Ideally the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List%2A> property should be set to a general <xref:System.Collections.IList>.
trans-unit.target: 在理想情況下<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List%2A>屬性應該設定的一般<xref:System.Collections.IList>。

trans-unit.source: However, sometimes it may be necessary to cast this property to a more specific type.
trans-unit.target: 不過，有時候可能需要這個屬性轉換成更特定的類型。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the underlying list type, which depends on the type or value of the data source.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示基礎清單類型，取決於資料來源的值的類型。

trans-unit.source: Data source type
trans-unit.target: 資料來源類型

trans-unit.source: Underlying list description
trans-unit.target: 基礎清單描述

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataSource%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataMember%2A> are `null`
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataSource%2A> 和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataMember%2A>是 `null`

trans-unit.source: An empty <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>.
trans-unit.target: 空的 <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataSource%2A> is `null`, but <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataMember%2A> is not `null`
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataSource%2A> 是`null`，但<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataMember%2A>不是 `null`

trans-unit.source: None; an attempt to get the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List%2A> will throw an <xref:System.ArgumentException>.
trans-unit.target: 無。嘗試取得<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List%2A>將會擲回<xref:System.ArgumentException>。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Array> instance
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Array>執行個體

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Array>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Array>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.RemoveAt%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Count%2A> members.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.RemoveAt%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Count%2A>成員。

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste the code into a form that contains a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> named `BindingSource1`, two labels named `label1` and `label2`, and a button named `button1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行此範例中，貼上程式碼包含表單的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>名為`BindingSource1`，兩個標籤命名為`label1`和`label2`，和名為按鈕`button1`。

trans-unit.source: Associate the `button1_Click` method with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click> event for `button1`.
trans-unit.target: 關聯`button1_Click`方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click>事件`button1`。

trans-unit.source: Visual Basic users will need to add a reference to System.Data.dll.
trans-unit.target: Visual Basic 使用者必須加入 System.Data.dll 的參考。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the underlying list changes or an item in the list changes.
trans-unit.target: 發生於基礎清單有變更或清單中的項目有變更時。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ListChanged> event occurs when there is a change to the membership or metadata of the underlying list represented by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ListChanged>成員資格或所代表的基礎清單的中繼資料變更時，就會發生事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: For example, this event is raised when items are added, removed, or moved, or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataSource%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataMember%2A> properties change.
trans-unit.target: 新增、 移除或移動項目時，例如，引發這個事件或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataSource%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataMember%2A>屬性變更。

trans-unit.source: The values of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Sort%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Filter%2A> properties will persist when this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Sort%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Filter%2A>內容將保存時就會發生此事件。

trans-unit.source: This event can be completely suppressed by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.RaiseListChangedEvents%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 這個事件可以藉由設定完全隱藏<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.RaiseListChangedEvents%2A>屬性`false`。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates handling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ListChanged> event of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> component to detect when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> component's underlying list is changed.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範處理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ListChanged>事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>元件偵測何時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>變更元件的基礎清單。

trans-unit.source: Moves to the first item in the list.
trans-unit.target: 移至清單中的第一個項目。

trans-unit.source: Changes the current value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Position%2A> property to 0, the first item in the underlying data source.
trans-unit.target: 變更的目前值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Position%2A>屬性設為 0、 基礎資料來源中的第一個項目。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.MoveNext%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.MoveFirst%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Current%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Position%2A> members.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.MoveNext%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.MoveFirst%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Current%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Position%2A>成員。

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste the code into a form that imports the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D> namespace and contains a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> named `BindingSource1` and a button named `button1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行此範例中，貼上程式碼會匯入表單<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D>命名空間和包含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>名為`BindingSource1`和名為按鈕`button1`。

trans-unit.source: Associate the `Form1_Load` and `Form1_Paint` methods with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> events for the form, and associate the `button1_click` method with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click> event for `button1`.
trans-unit.target: 關聯`Form1_Load`和`Form1_Paint`方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>表單，並建立關聯的事件`button1_click`方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click>事件`button1`。

trans-unit.source: Visual Basic users will need to add a reference to System.Data.dll.
trans-unit.target: Visual Basic 使用者必須加入 System.Data.dll 的參考。

trans-unit.source: Moves to the last item in the list.
trans-unit.target: 移至清單中的最後一個項目。

trans-unit.source: Changes the current value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Position%2A> property to the index of the last item in the underlying data source, which is equal to the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Count%2A> property minus 1.
trans-unit.target: 變更的目前值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Position%2A>屬性的值相等基礎資料來源中的最後一個項目的索引<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Count%2A>減 1 的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Moves to the next item in the list.

trans-unit.target: 變更的目前值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Position%2A>基礎資料來源中的下一個項目屬性。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AddingNew" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AddingNew" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.OnAddingNew%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.OnAddingNew%2A> 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.OnAddingNew(System.ComponentModel.AddingNewEventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.OnAddingNew(System.ComponentModel.AddingNewEventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 當在衍生類別中覆寫 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.OnAddingNew(System.ComponentModel.AddingNewEventArgs)" /> 時，請確定呼叫基底類別的 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.OnAddingNew(System.ComponentModel.AddingNewEventArgs)" /> 方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.OnDataMemberChanged%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.OnDataMemberChanged%2A> 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.OnDataMemberChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.OnDataMemberChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 當在衍生類別中覆寫 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.OnDataMemberChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> 時，請確定呼叫基底類別的 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.OnDataMemberChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> 方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.OnDataMemberChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.OnDataMemberChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件資料的 <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" />。

trans-unit.target: 引發 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.PositionChanged" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

trans-unit.target: 當在衍生類別中覆寫 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.OnPositionChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> 時，請確定呼叫基底類別的 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.OnPositionChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> 方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the index of the current item in the underlying list.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定基礎清單中目前項目的索引。

trans-unit.source: A zero-based index that specifies the position of the current item in the underlying list.
trans-unit.target: 以零為起始的索引，指定基礎清單中目前項目的位置。

trans-unit.source: When setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Position%2A> property, out-of-range values are treated in the following manner:
trans-unit.target: 設定時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Position%2A>屬性超出範圍的值會視為以下列方式：

trans-unit.source: Negative values are treated as 0.
trans-unit.target: 負值視為 0。

trans-unit.source: Values greater than or equal to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Count%2A> are treated as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Count%2A> minus 1.
trans-unit.target: 值大於或等於<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Count%2A>會被視為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Count%2A>減 1。

trans-unit.source: Changing the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Position%2A> property will adjust the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Current%2A> property likewise.
trans-unit.target: 變更<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Position%2A>屬性將會調整<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Current%2A>屬性同樣。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.MoveNext%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.MoveFirst%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Current%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Position%2A> members.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.MoveNext%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.MoveFirst%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Current%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Position%2A>成員。

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste the code into a form that imports the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D> namespace and contains a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> named `BindingSource1` and a button named `button1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行此範例中，貼上程式碼會匯入表單<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D>命名空間和包含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>名為`BindingSource1`和名為按鈕`button1`。

trans-unit.source: Associate the `Form1_Load` and `Form1_Paint` methods with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> events for the form, and associate the `button1_click` method with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click> event for `button1`.
trans-unit.target: 關聯`Form1_Load`和`Form1_Paint`方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>表單，並建立關聯的事件`button1_click`方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click>事件`button1`。

trans-unit.source: Visual Basic users will need to add a reference to System.Data.dll.
trans-unit.target: Visual Basic 使用者必須加入 System.Data.dll 的參考。

trans-unit.source: Occurs after the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Position" /> property has changed.
trans-unit.target: 發生於 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Position" /> 屬性的值已變更後。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.PositionChanged> event occurs after the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Position%2A> property has changed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.PositionChanged>之後就會發生事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Position%2A>屬性已變更。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ListChanged" /> events should be raised.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否應該引發 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ListChanged" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ListChanged" /> events should be raised; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果應該要引發 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ListChanged" /> 事件，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.RaiseListChangedEvents%2A> property is `false`, it suspends the raising of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ListChanged> events.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.RaiseListChangedEvents%2A>屬性是`false`，它會暫止引發<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ListChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: This event indicates that the bound list has been modified in some way, including adding, deleting, inserting, or modifying items.
trans-unit.target: 這個事件表示，已在某些方面，包括新增、 刪除、 插入或修改項目修改繫結的清單。

trans-unit.source: The item to remove from the underlying list represented by the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 要從 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List" /> 屬性所表示的基礎清單中移除的項目。

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified item from the list.
trans-unit.target: 從清單中移除指定的項目。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Remove%2A> method causes the list to be searched for the `value` parameter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Remove%2A>方法會造成要在其中搜尋清單`value`參數。

trans-unit.source: If found, this method will attempt to remove the item from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果找不到，這個方法將會嘗試移除的項目從<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List%2A>。

trans-unit.source: This attempt will fail if the list has a fixed size or is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 如果清單有固定的大小，或處於唯讀狀態，這項嘗試將會失敗。

trans-unit.source: These two conditions can be tested with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.IsFixedSize%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.IsReadOnly%2A> properties, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 這兩項條件可使用測試<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.IsFixedSize%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.IsReadOnly%2A>屬性，分別。

trans-unit.source: This method raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ListChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會引發<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ListChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: The underlying list has a fixed size or is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 此基礎清單具有固定大小或是唯讀的。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the item to remove.
trans-unit.target: 要移除之項目的以零為起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: Removes the item at the specified index in the list.
trans-unit.target: 移除清單中位於指定索引上的項目。

trans-unit.source: These two conditions can be tested with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.IsFixedSize%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.IsReadOnly%2A> properties, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 這兩項條件可使用測試<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.IsFixedSize%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.IsReadOnly%2A>屬性，分別。

trans-unit.source: This method raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ListChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會引發<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ListChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.RemoveAt%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Count%2A> members.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.RemoveAt%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Count%2A>成員。

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste the code into a form that contains a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> named `BindingSource1`, two labels named `label1` and `label2`, and a button named `button1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行此範例中，貼上程式碼包含表單的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>名為`BindingSource1`，兩個標籤命名為`label1`和`label2`，和名為按鈕`button1`。

trans-unit.source: Associate the `button1_Click` method with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click> event for `button1`.
trans-unit.target: 關聯`button1_Click`方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click>事件`button1`。

trans-unit.source: Visual Basic users will need to add a reference to System.Data.dll.
trans-unit.target: Visual Basic 使用者必須加入 System.Data.dll 的參考。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> is less than zero or greater than the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Count" /> property.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> 小於零或大於 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Count" /> 屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: The underlying list represented by the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List" /> property is read-only or has a fixed size.
trans-unit.target: 由 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List" /> 屬性所表示的基礎清單是唯讀的，或是具有固定大小。

trans-unit.source: Removes the current item from the list.
trans-unit.target: 從清單中移除目前項目。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.RemoveCurrent%2A> method is equivalent to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.RemoveAt%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.RemoveCurrent%2A>方法相當於<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.RemoveAt%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AllowRemove" /> property is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AllowRemove" /> 屬性為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Position" /> is less than zero or greater than <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Count" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Position" /> 小於零或大於 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Count" />。

trans-unit.source: The underlying list represented by the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List" /> property is read-only or has a fixed size.
trans-unit.target: 由 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.List" /> 屬性所表示的基礎清單是唯讀的，或是具有固定大小。

trans-unit.source: Removes the filter associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource" />.
trans-unit.target: 移除與 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource" /> 有關的篩選條件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.RemoveFilter%2A> method refers the request to the underlying list's <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingListView.RemoveFilter%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.RemoveFilter%2A>方法指向基礎清單中的要求<xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingListView.RemoveFilter%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: Only lists that implement <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingListView> support filtering.
trans-unit.target: 只會列出實作<xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingListView>支援篩選。

trans-unit.source: By default, a call to this method is equivalent to setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Filter%2A> property to `null`.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，此方法的呼叫就相當於設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Filter%2A>屬性`null`。

trans-unit.source: The underlying list does not support filtering.
trans-unit.target: 基礎清單不支援篩選。

trans-unit.source: Removes the sort associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource" />.
trans-unit.target: 移除與 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource" /> 有關的排序。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.RemoveSort%2A> method refers the request to the underlying list's <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.RemoveSort%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.RemoveSort%2A>方法指向基礎清單中的要求<xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.RemoveSort%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: Only lists that implement <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList> support sorting.
trans-unit.target: 只會列出實作<xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList>支援排序。

trans-unit.source: By default, a call to this method is equivalent to setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Sort%2A> property to `null`.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，此方法的呼叫就相當於設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Sort%2A>屬性`null`。

trans-unit.source: The underlying list does not support sorting.
trans-unit.target: 基礎清單不支援排序。

trans-unit.source: Reinitializes the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AllowNew" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 重新初始化 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AllowNew" /> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ResetAllowNew%2A> method reinitializes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AllowNew%2A> property to reflect the value of the corresponding <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AllowNew%2A> property in the underlying list.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ResetAllowNew%2A>方法重新初始化<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AllowNew%2A>屬性，以反映的對應值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.AllowNew%2A>基礎清單中的屬性。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the data schema has changed; <see langword="false" /> if only values have changed.
trans-unit.target: 如果資料結構描述已變更，則為 <see langword="true" />；如果只是變更值，則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Causes a control bound to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource" /> to reread all the items in the list and refresh their displayed values.
trans-unit.target: 使得繫結至 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource" /> 的控制項重新讀取清單中的所有項目，並重新整理其顯示的值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ResetBindings%2A> method informs all controls bound to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> to refresh their values.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ResetBindings%2A>方法會通知所有繫結至控制項<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>重新整理它們的值。

trans-unit.source: The method does this by raising the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ListChanged> event at least once; the `metaDataChanged` parameter indicates the nature of the underlying change.
trans-unit.target: 方法會藉由引發<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ListChanged>至少一次事件;`metaDataChanged`參數表示基礎變更的性質。

trans-unit.source: A `metaDataChanged` value of `true` indicates that the data schema of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> has changed.
trans-unit.target: A`metaDataChanged`值`true`表示的資料結構描述<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>已變更。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ListChanged> event is raised with <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListChangedEventArgs.ListChangedType?displayProperty=nameWithType> set to <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListChangedType.PropertyDescriptorChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ListChanged>引發與<xref:System.ComponentModel.ListChangedEventArgs.ListChangedType?displayProperty=nameWithType>設<xref:System.ComponentModel.ListChangedType.PropertyDescriptorChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: A `metaDataChanged` value of `false` indicates that only the values of one or more items have changed.
trans-unit.target: A`metaDataChanged`值`false`指出只有一個或多個項目值已變更。

trans-unit.source: Regardless of the value of `metaDataChanged`, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ListChanged> event is raised with <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListChangedEventArgs.ListChangedType?displayProperty=nameWithType> set to <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListChangedType.Reset?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 值為何`metaDataChanged`、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ListChanged>引發與<xref:System.ComponentModel.ListChangedEventArgs.ListChangedType?displayProperty=nameWithType>設<xref:System.ComponentModel.ListChangedType.Reset?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: As a consequence, calling <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ResetBindings%2A> with a parameter of `true` will raise two <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ListChanged> events.
trans-unit.target: 因此，呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ResetBindings%2A>和參數`true`將會引發兩個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ListChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ResetBindings%2A> is automatically called whenever another member makes major changes to the data-binding, such as setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataSource%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataMember%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ResetBindings%2A> 每當另一個成員會對資料繫結，例如設定中的重大變更會自動呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataSource%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.DataMember%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: However, the programmer can also call this method explicitly.
trans-unit.target: 不過，程式設計人員也可以呼叫這個方法明確。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> component to bind an array list, which does not provide change notification.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>元件繫結的陣列清單不會提供變更通知。

trans-unit.source: An item is removed from the list, and the bound controls are notified of the change by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ResetBindings%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 從清單中移除某個項目和繫結的控制項都會收到通知，變更的呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ResetBindings%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided in [How to: Reflect Data Source Updates in a Windows Forms Control with the BindingSource](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/reflect-data-source-updates-in-a-wf-control-with-the-bindingsource.md).
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分[How to： 使用 BindingSource 的 Windows Form 控制項中的反映資料來源更新](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/reflect-data-source-updates-in-a-wf-control-with-the-bindingsource.md)。

trans-unit.source: Causes a control bound to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource" /> to reread the currently selected item and refresh its displayed value.
trans-unit.target: 使得繫結至 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource" /> 的控制項重新讀取目前選取的項目，並重新整理其顯示的值。

trans-unit.source: Calling this method will cause the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ListChanged> event to occur, specifying the item changed at the current position.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫此方法會導致<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ListChanged>事件發生時，指定的項目變更目前的位置。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the item that has changed.
trans-unit.target: 已變更的項目之以零為起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: Causes a control bound to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource" /> to reread the item at the specified index, and refresh its displayed value.
trans-unit.target: 使得繫結至 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource" /> 的控制項重新讀取指定索引上的項目，並重新整理其顯示的值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ResetItem%2A> method notifies all controls bound to the item at the specified <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Position%2A> to refresh their values.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ResetItem%2A>方法會通知所有控制項繫結至指定的項目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Position%2A>重新整理它們的值。

trans-unit.source: The method does this by raising the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ListChanged> event with <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListChangedEventArgs.ListChangedType?displayProperty=nameWithType> set to <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListChangedType.ItemChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 方法會藉由引發<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ListChanged>事件<xref:System.ComponentModel.ListChangedEventArgs.ListChangedType?displayProperty=nameWithType>設<xref:System.ComponentModel.ListChangedType.ItemChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ResetItem%2A> is automatically called whenever changes are made to the value of an individual item.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ResetItem%2A> 會自動呼叫對個別項目的值變更時。

trans-unit.source: However, the programmer can also call this method explicitly.
trans-unit.target: 不過，程式設計人員也可以呼叫這個方法明確。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> component to bind a list to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>元件繫結至清單<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The list does not raise change notifications, so the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ResetItem%2A> method on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> is used to raise the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ListChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 清單不會引發變更通知，因此<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ResetItem%2A>方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>用來引發<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ListChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided in [How to: Raise Change Notifications Using the BindingSource ResetItem Method](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-raise-change-notifications-using-the-bindingsource-resetitem-method.md).
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分[How to： 使用 BindingSource ResetItem 方法引發變更通知](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-raise-change-notifications-using-the-bindingsource-resetitem-method.md)。

trans-unit.source: Resumes data binding.
trans-unit.target: 繼續資料繫結。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.SuspendBinding%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ResumeBinding%2A> are two methods that allow the temporary suspension and resumption of data binding in a simple-binding scenario.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.SuspendBinding%2A> 和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ResumeBinding%2A>的簡單繫結案例中允許的暫止和繼續資料繫結的兩種方法。

trans-unit.source: You would typically suspend data binding if the user must be allowed to make several edits to data fields before validation occurs.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用者必須能夠對數個編輯資料欄位發生驗證之前，您通常會暫止資料繫結。

trans-unit.source: For example, if one field must be changed in accordance with a second, but where validating the first field would cause the second field to be in error.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果必須變更一個欄位，根據第二個，但在此驗證的第一個欄位會導致錯誤的第二個欄位。

trans-unit.source: Using <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.SuspendBinding%2A> prevents changes from being pushed into the data source until <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ResumeBinding%2A> is called, but does not actually prevent any events from occurring.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.SuspendBinding%2A>防止變更發送到資料來源，直到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ResumeBinding%2A>呼叫，但不會實際阻止任何事件發生。

trans-unit.source: Controls that use complex data binding, such as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control, update their values based on change events such as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.ListChanged> event, so calling <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.SuspendBinding%2A> will not prevent them from receiving changes to the data source.
trans-unit.target: 使用複雜資料繫結，例如控制項<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制項，更新其值，例如根據變更事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.ListChanged>事件，因此呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.SuspendBinding%2A>不會阻止其接收到資料來源的變更。

trans-unit.source: For this reason, this <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.SuspendBinding%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ResumeBinding%2A> are designed for use with simple-bound controls, such as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control.
trans-unit.target: 基於這個理由，這<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.SuspendBinding%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ResumeBinding%2A>專為簡單繫結控制項中這類<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Alternatively you can use these methods in a complex binding scenario if you suppress <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ListChanged> events by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.RaiseListChangedEvents%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 或者您可以使用這些方法在複雜繫結案例中如果要抑制<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ListChanged>藉由設定事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.RaiseListChangedEvents%2A>屬性`false`。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the column names used for sorting, and the sort order for viewing the rows in the data source.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定用來排序的資料行名稱，以及用來檢視資料來源中資料列的排序次序。

trans-unit.source: A case-sensitive string containing the column name followed by "ASC" (for ascending) or "DESC" (for descending).
trans-unit.target: 區分大小寫的字串，包含資料行名稱，後面緊接著 "ASC" (表示遞增) 或 "DESC" (表示遞減)。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Sort%2A> property is a case-sensitive string that specifies the column names used to sort the rows, along with the sort direction.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Sort%2A>屬性是區分大小寫的字串，指定用來排序資料列，以及排序方向的資料行名稱。

trans-unit.source: Columns are sorted ascending by default.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設會遞增排序資料行。

trans-unit.source: Multiple columns can be separated by commas, such as `"State, ZipCode DESC"`.
trans-unit.target: 多個資料行可以以逗號分隔，例如`"State, ZipCode DESC"`。

trans-unit.source: To support sorting, the underlying list must implement the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList> or <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingListView> interfaces.
trans-unit.target: 若要支援排序，必須實作的基礎清單<xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList>或<xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingListView>介面。

trans-unit.source: This capability can be queried through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.SupportsSorting%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 這項功能可以透過查詢<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.SupportsSorting%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Multicolumn sorting is available when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.SupportsAdvancedSorting%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 多重資料行排序時，才能使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.SupportsAdvancedSorting%2A>屬性是`true`。

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Sort%2A> property will change the internal list depending on its type:
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Sort%2A>屬性會變更內部根據其類型清單：

trans-unit.source: If the list is of type <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList>, the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.SortProperty%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.SortDirection%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> properties are set in the internal list.
trans-unit.target: 如果清單的類型是<xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList>、<xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.SortProperty%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>和<xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.SortDirection%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性會設定在內部的清單。

trans-unit.source: If the list is of type <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingListView>, the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingListView.SortDescriptions%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property is set.
trans-unit.target: 如果清單的類型是<xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingListView>、<xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingListView.SortDescriptions%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性設定。

trans-unit.source: The internal list's sort properties are only changed when the sort string is not `null`.
trans-unit.target: 排序字串不是時，只會變更內部清單的排序屬性`null`。

trans-unit.source: The `get` accessor for this property will not retrieve the sort value of the internal list; instead, it will return the `set` accessor value.
trans-unit.target: `get`這個屬性存取子將不會擷取內部清單的排序值; 相反地，它會傳回`set`存取子的值。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Sort%2A> property will persist when the data source changes.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Sort%2A>屬性將會保存資料來源變更時。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Sort%2A> property to perform basic sorting with a <xref:System.Data.DataView>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Sort%2A>屬性來執行基本排序<xref:System.Data.DataView>。

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste the code into a Windows Form and call `PopulateDataViewAndSort` from the form's constructor or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load> event-handling method.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行此範例中，貼上程式碼的 Windows Form 和呼叫`PopulateDataViewAndSort`從表單的建構函式或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load>事件處理方法。

trans-unit.source: Your form should import the <xref:System.Xml> and <xref:System.IO> namespaces.
trans-unit.target: 應該先匯入您的表單<xref:System.Xml>和<xref:System.IO>命名空間。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Sort%2A> property to perform advanced sorting with a <xref:System.Data.DataView>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Sort%2A>屬性來執行進階排序<xref:System.Data.DataView>。

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste the code into a Windows Form and call `PopulateDataViewAndAdvancedSort` from the form's constructor or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load> event-handling method.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行此範例中，貼上程式碼的 Windows Form 和呼叫`PopulateDataViewAndAdvancedSort`從表單的建構函式或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load>事件處理方法。

trans-unit.source: Your form should import the <xref:System.Xml> and <xref:System.IO> namespaces.
trans-unit.target: 應該先匯入您的表單<xref:System.Xml>和<xref:System.IO>命名空間。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of sort descriptions applied to the data source.
trans-unit.target: 取得套用至資料來源的排序描述集合。

trans-unit.source: If the data source is an <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IBindingListView" />, a <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescriptionCollection" /> that contains the sort descriptions applied to the list; otherwise, <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果資料來源為 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IBindingListView" />，則為包含套用至該清單之排序描述的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescriptionCollection" />，否則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: If the list is not an <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingListView>, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.SortDescriptions%2A> always returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果清單不是<xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingListView>、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.SortDescriptions%2A>一律會傳回`null`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescriptionCollection> is a read-only collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListSortDescriptionCollection>是唯讀的集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets the direction the items in the list are sorted.
trans-unit.target: 取得清單中項目排序的方向。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ListSortDirection" /> values indicating the direction the list is sorted.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ListSortDirection" /> 值，表示清單排序的方向。

trans-unit.source: If the underlying list is not an <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList>, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.SortDirection%2A> property will always return <xref:System.ComponentModel.ListSortDirection.Ascending>.
trans-unit.target: 如果基礎清單不是<xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList>、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.SortDirection%2A>屬性一律會傳回<xref:System.ComponentModel.ListSortDirection.Ascending>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor" /> that is being used for sorting the list.
trans-unit.target: 取得已經用來為清單排序的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor" />。

trans-unit.source: If the list is an <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList" />, the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor" /> that is being used for sorting; otherwise, <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果清單是 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList" />，則為用於排序的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor" />，否則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: If the list is not an <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.SortProperty%2A> always returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果清單不是<xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList>，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.SortProperty%2A>一律會傳回`null`。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the data source supports multi-column sorting.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出資料來源是否支援多欄排序。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the list is an <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IBindingListView" /> and supports multi-column sorting; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果清單為 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IBindingListView" /> 並支援多欄排序，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: If the list is not an <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingListView>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.SupportsAdvancedSorting%2A> always returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果清單不是<xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingListView>，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.SupportsAdvancedSorting%2A>一律會傳回`false`。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the data source supports change notification.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出資料來源是否支援變更告知。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: 所有情況下都是 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the data source supports filtering.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出資料來源是否支援篩選。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the list is an <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IBindingListView" /> and supports filtering; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果清單為 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IBindingListView" /> 並支援篩選，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: If the list is not an <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingListView>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.SupportsFiltering%2A> always returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果清單不是<xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingListView>，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.SupportsFiltering%2A>一律會傳回`false`。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the data source supports searching with the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Find(System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor,System.Object)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出資料來源是否支援使用 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Find(System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor,System.Object)" /> 方法進行搜尋。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the list is a <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList" /> and supports the searching with the <see cref="Overload:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Find" /> method; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果清單為 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList" />，並支援使用 <see cref="Overload:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.Find" /> 方法進行搜尋，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: If the data source is not an <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.SupportsSearching%2A> always returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果資料來源不是<xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList>，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.SupportsSearching%2A>一律會傳回`false`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.SupportsSearching%2A> member.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.SupportsSearching%2A>成員。

trans-unit.source: For the complete example see the class overview topic.
trans-unit.target: 如需完整範例，請參閱類別概觀主題。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the data source supports sorting.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出資料來源是否支援排序。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the data source is an <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList" /> and supports sorting; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果資料來源為 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList" /> 並支援排序，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: If the data source is not an <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList>, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.SupportsSorting%2A> property always returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果資料來源不是<xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList>、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.SupportsSorting%2A>屬性一律會傳回`false`。

trans-unit.source: Suspends data binding to prevent changes from updating the bound data source.
trans-unit.target: 暫止資料繫結以防止變更更新繫結的資料來源。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.SuspendBinding%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ResumeBinding%2A> are two methods that allow the temporary suspension and resumption of data binding in a simple-binding scenario.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.SuspendBinding%2A> 和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ResumeBinding%2A>的簡單繫結案例中允許的暫止和繼續資料繫結的兩種方法。

trans-unit.source: You would typically suspend data binding if the user must be allowed to make several edits to data fields before validation occurs.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用者必須能夠對數個編輯資料欄位發生驗證之前，您通常會暫止資料繫結。

trans-unit.source: For example, if one field must be changed in accordance with a second, but where validating the first field would cause the second field to be in error.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果必須變更一個欄位，根據第二個，但在此驗證的第一個欄位會導致錯誤的第二個欄位。

trans-unit.source: Using <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.SuspendBinding%2A> and prevents changes from being pushed into the data source until <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ResumeBinding%2A> is called, but does not actually prevent any events from occurring.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.SuspendBinding%2A>並防止變更發送到資料來源，直到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ResumeBinding%2A>呼叫，但不會實際阻止任何事件發生。

trans-unit.source: Controls that use complex data binding, such as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control, update their values based on change events such as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.ListChanged> event, so calling <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.SuspendBinding%2A> will not prevent them from receiving changes to the data source.
trans-unit.target: 使用複雜資料繫結，例如控制項<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制項，更新其值，例如根據變更事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager.ListChanged>事件，因此呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.SuspendBinding%2A>不會阻止其接收到資料來源的變更。

trans-unit.source: For this reason, this <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.SuspendBinding%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ResumeBinding%2A> are designed for use with simple-bound controls, such as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control.
trans-unit.target: 基於這個理由，這<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.SuspendBinding%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ResumeBinding%2A>專為簡單繫結控制項中這類<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Alternatively you can use these methods in a complex binding scenario if you suppress <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ListChanged> events by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.RaiseListChangedEvents%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 或者您可以使用這些方法在複雜繫結案例中如果要抑制<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.ListChanged>藉由設定事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.RaiseListChangedEvents%2A>屬性`false`。

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that can be used to synchronize access to the underlying list.
trans-unit.target: 取得可用來同步對基礎清單存取的物件。

trans-unit.source: An object that can be used to synchronize access to the underlying list.
trans-unit.target: 可用來同步存取基礎清單的物件。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor" /> to add to the indexes used for searching.
trans-unit.target: 要加入至用來搜尋之索引的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor" />。

trans-unit.source: Adds the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor" /> to the indexes used for searching.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor" /> 加入用來搜尋的索引中。

trans-unit.source: If the underlying list is an <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList> type, this method will add the <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor> to the indexes; otherwise, calling this method will throw a <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.
trans-unit.target: 如果基礎清單<xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList>型別，這個方法會加入<xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor>的索引; 否則呼叫這個方法會擲回<xref:System.NotSupportedException>。

trans-unit.source: The underlying list is not an <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList" />.
trans-unit.target: 基礎清單不是 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor" /> to remove from the indexes used for searching.
trans-unit.target: 要從用來搜尋的索引中移除的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor" />。

trans-unit.source: Removes the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor" /> from the indexes used for searching.
trans-unit.target: 從用來搜尋的索引中移除 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor" />。

trans-unit.source: If the underlying list is not a <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList?displayProperty=nameWithType>, this method will always throw a <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.
trans-unit.target: 如果基礎清單不是<xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList?displayProperty=nameWithType>，這個方法一律會擲回<xref:System.NotSupportedException>。

trans-unit.source: The index of the item that was added to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 已加入集合中的項目之索引。

trans-unit.source: Discards a pending new item from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 從集合中捨棄暫止的新項目。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.System%23ComponentModel%23ICancelAddNew%23CancelNew%2A> method rolls back a pending addition of an item previously added to the collection at the index specified by `position`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.System%23ComponentModel%23ICancelAddNew%23CancelNew%2A>方法會復原暫止的加入先前加入至集合中指定的索引處的項目`position`。

trans-unit.source: The `position` parameter is necessary because several new items can be simultaneously pending.
trans-unit.target: `position`參數是必要的因為數個新項目可以同時暫止。

trans-unit.source: The index of the item that was added to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 已加入集合中的項目之索引。

trans-unit.source: Commits a pending new item to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 將暫止的新項目認可到集合中。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.System%23ComponentModel%23ICancelAddNew%23EndNew%2A> method commits a pending addition of an item previously added to the collection at the index specified by `position`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.System%23ComponentModel%23ICancelAddNew%23EndNew%2A>方法會認可暫止的加入先前加入至集合中指定的索引處的項目`position`。

trans-unit.source: The `position` parameter is necessary because several new items can be simultaneously pending.
trans-unit.target: `position`參數是必要的因為數個新項目可以同時暫止。

trans-unit.source: Signals the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource" /> that initialization is starting.
trans-unit.target: 向 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource" /> 表示正在啟動初始化。

trans-unit.source: Signals the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource" /> that initialization is complete.
trans-unit.target: 向 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource" /> 表示初始化已完成。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource" /> is initialized.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否已初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to indicate the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource" /> is initialized; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示已初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> instance is cast to an <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitializeNotification> interface.
trans-unit.target: 只有在 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> 執行個體轉換成 <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitializeNotification> 介面時，才能使用這個成員。
